titles.title: Kings Bay Trident Modernization Act
Kings Bay Trident Modernization Act
A bill to authorize the appropriation of amounts for the construction of a trident refit facility expansion at Kings Bay Naval Submarine Base, Georgia.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Kings Bay Trident Modernization Act
This bill authorizes FY2025 appropriations for the Department of Defense to construct a trident refit facility expansion at Kings Bay Naval Submarine Base, Georgia.
